name: Isentia
description: Isentia is the Asia-Pacific region's leading media intelligence company; empowering clients to understand their brand and reputation since 1982. Our clients are diverse, ranging from globally renowned brands right through to government bodies and not for profit organisations. Isentia was acquired by UK based company Access Intelligence on September 1st, 2021 and the future looks bright as we join forces to become a global leader in media intelligence. Our mission is to create actionable insight from complex communication channels. With powerful technology and clever people, we deliver what’s relevant when our clients need it, driving decisions and opening possibilities.
features: Leading provider of embedded analytics and multilingual capabilities
Modular solution to suit a variety of needs, departments and organisations
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Empowering clients to make great decisions.
ShortDescription: Isentia is the Asia-Pacific region's leading media intelligence company; empowering clients to understand their brand and reputation since 1982.
enhanced_description: Isentia is a leading media intelligence company in the Asia-Pacific region, founded in 1982 and acquired by UK-based Access Intelligence on September 1st, 2021. The platform empowers clients, including globally renowned brands, government bodies, and non-profit organizations, to understand their brand and reputation by providing actionable insights from complex communication channels. Leveraging powerful technology and expert analysis, Isentia delivers relevant information to drive decisions and open possibilities. While its core focus is media intelligence, the solution is also positioned to support HR functions like talent management and career development, aiming to improve employee happiness and engagement, boost hiring manager confidence and productivity, and accelerate skill development and learning efficiency. Key features include renowned, high-quality client support, leading embedded analytics, and multilingual capabilities delivered through a modular solution.
key_use_cases: Creating actionable insights from communication channels
Driving decisions based on media intelligence
Boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity
Accelerating skill development and learning efficiency
competitive_advantages: Leading media intelligence provider in Asia-Pacific
Modular solution to suit varied needs and departments
roi_benefits: Better understanding of brand and reputation
